text: a taruvata varu, allah anumatito varini (satyatiraskarulanu) odincaru. Mariyu davud, jalut nu sanharincadu mariyu allah ataniki (davud ku) rajyadhikaram mariyu jnanam prasadinci, tanu korina visayalanu ataniki bodhincadu. I vidhanga allah prajalanu, okari nundi marokarini kapadakunte, bhumilo kallolam vyapinci undedi. Kani allah samasta lokala mida ento anugraham galavadu
